[This text includes characters that require UTF-8 (Unicode) file
encoding, including:

   (double line, used to separate items in critical apparatus)
   (Tironian ampersand)
    (vowels with macron or long mark)
    (other less common diacritics)
   (yogh, see Transcribers Notes)
   (abbreviation for vel, see Transcribers Notes)

If any of these characters do not display properly--in particular, if
the diacritic does not appear directly above the letter--or if the
apostrophes and quotation marks in this paragraph appear as garbage,
make sure your text readers character set or file encoding is set
to Unicode (UTF-8). You may also need to change the default font.

In this e-text, lfrics Grammar and Glossary is given twice. First
it is presented as printed, with full critical apparatus and text
formatting. It is then repeated with only the plain text, as edited
by Zupitza (text search: TEXT-ONLY VERSION).

The editor used three kinds of typographic markings: italics, shown
conventionally with _lines_, gesperrt (spread-out) text, shown here with
#marks#, and small capitals, shown here as ALL CAPITALS. All three are
used in the body text; in the apparatus, only italics occur regularly.

Although the content is prose, the body text is shown indented to
preserve line numbering; page numbers are given in [[double brackets]].
Words split across a page or line break have sometimes been moved _down_
(to the lower line) to agree with the critical apparatus.

Further details about the text and transcription are given in the
Transcribers Notes.]

                    LFRICS

             GRAMMATIK und GLOSSAR

  Weimar.--Hof-Buchdruckerei.




  VORLUFIGES VORWORT.


Fr diese erste kritische ausgabe von lfrics Grammatik und Glossar sind
die folgenden handschriften bentzt worden:

  _A_ = hs. von All Souls College zu Oxford;
  _C_ = hs. von Corpus Christi College zu Cambridge;
  _D_ = hs. der Cathedral Library zu Durham;
  _F_ = hs. der Cottonschen sammlung, Faustina;
  _H_ = hs. der Harleyschen sammlung;
  _h_ = eine zweite hs. derselben sammlung;
  _J_ = eine zweite hs. der Cottonschen sammlung, Julius;
  _O_ = hs. von St. Johns College zu Oxford;
  _P_ = Pariser hs.;
  _R_ = ein codex regius des Brit. Museums;
  _r_ = ein zweiter codex regius;
  _S_ = hs. zu Sigmaringen;
  _T_ = hs. von Trinity College zu Cambridge;
  _U_ = hs. der University Library zu Cambridge;
  _W_ = hs. der Cathedral Library zu Worcester.

Ich habe es unterlassen die schreibung zu normalisieren: im allgemeinen
bin ich in dieser _O_ gefolgt. fehler der hs., aus welcher die
erhaltenen geflossen sind, habe ich dann unverbessert gelassen, wenn mir
die mglichkeit nicht ausgeschlossen schien, dass sich lfric selbst
geirrt haben knnte. selbstverstndlich werden alle diese flle in den
anmerkungen zur sprache kommen. ich fge hier nur noch hinzu, dass bei
den varianten eine runde klammer anzeigt, dass die betreffenden
buchstaben oder wrter ber der zeile nachgetragen worden sind; eine
eckige dagegen, dass sie jetzt in der hs. nicht mehr vorhanden sind.

  #Oppeln#, den 16. september 1880.

  J. Z.




  [[1]]
  INCIPIT PRAEFATIO
  HVIVS LIBRI.


  _Ego lfricus, ut minus sapiens, has excerptiones de Prisciano
  minore uel maiore uobis puerulis tenellis ad uestram
  linguam transferre studui, quatinus perlectis octo partibus          5
  Donati in isto libello potestis utramque linguam,
  uidelicet latinam et anglicam, uestrae teneritudini inserere
  interim, usque quo ad perfectiora perueniatis studia. noui
  namque multos me reprehensuros, quod talibus studiis meum
  ingenium occupare uoluissem, scilicet grammaticam artem             10
  ad anglicam linguam uertendo. sed ego deputo hanc lectionem
  inscientibus puerulis, non senibus, aptandam fore.
  scio multimodis uerba posse interpretari, sed ego simplicem
  interpretationem sequor fastidii uitandi causa. si alicui
  tamen displicuerit, nostram interpretationem dicat, quomodo         15
  uult: nos contenti sumus, sicut didicimus in scola Aelwoldi,
  uenerabilis praesulis, qui multos ad bonum imbuit._

_Der anfang bis 3^24 nur in DHhORU_ 1. 2 _berschrift f. DHU_ 3 ego] e
_h_, go _D_ 6 possitis _U_  utrque lingue _U_ 7 latine et anglicae
_U_  tenerritudini _DHhORU_ 8 s _ausradiert vor_ perueniatis _O_ 9
deprehensuros _DHhORU, aber_ d _radiert und_ (_von neuerer hand?_) _zu_
r _R_, d _zum teil rad. U_ 11 set _O_ 13 scio enim _U_  multis modis
_R_  set _O_  symplicem _U_ 14 fastidunitandi causam _U_  uastidii
_R_ 15 nostra interpretatio (_durch rasur R_) _RU_ 16 scolis uenerabilis
aelwoldi presulis _U_ 17 ad _aus_ ac? _1. corr.h_

  [[_Der anfang bis 3^24 nur in DHhORU_
    text has 3, 24]]

  [[2]]
   _sciendum tamen, quod ars grammatica multis in locis non
  facile anglicae linguae capit interpretationem, sicut de
  pedibus uel metris, de quibus hic reticemus, sed aestimamus
  ad inchoationem tamen hanc interpretationem paruulis
  prodesse posse, sicut iam diximus. miror ualde, quare                5
  multi corripiunt sillabas in prosa, quae in metro breues
  sunt, cum prosa absoluta sit a lege metri; sicut pronuntiant
  _pater_ brittonice et _malus_ et similia, quae in metro
  habentur breues. mihi tamen uidetur melius inuocare deum
  patrem honorifice producta sillaba, quam brittonice corripere,      10
  quia nec deus arti grammaticae subiciendus est.
  ualete, o pueruli, in domino._

2 facilis _O_ 3 bus _in_ pedibus _auf r. 1. corr. h_  de metris _H_ 
recitemus _DHhORU_  set _O_ 4 tamen _vor_ ad _U_ 5 posse _f. O_

puerili _zu_ pueruli_R_


  Ic lfrc wolde s lytlan bc wendan t engliscum
  gereorde of m stfcrfte, e is gehten GRAMMATICA,
  syan ic  tw bc wende on hundeahtatigum spellum,              15
  foran e stfcrft is so cg, e ra bca andgit unlc;
  and ic hte, t os bc mihte fremjan jungum
  cildum t anginne s crftes, t h t mran andgyte
  becumon. lcum men gebyra, e nigne gdne
  crft hf, t h one d nytne rum mannum and                   20
  befste t pund, e him god befste, sumum rum
  men, t godes feoh ne tlicge and h bo lyre owa
  gehten and bo gebunden and geworpen int ostrum,
  swsw t hlige godspel seg. jungum mannum gedafena,
  t h leornjon sumne wsdm and m ealdum                         25

  [[4]]
  INCIPIVNT EXCERPTIONES DE ARTE GRAMMATICA ANGLICE.


  SECVNDVM DONATVM OMNIS VOX AVT ARTICVLATA EST AVT CONFVSA.
  ARTICVLATA EST, QVAE LITTERIS CONPREHENDI POTEST;
  CONFVSA, QVAE SCRIBI NON POTEST. stemn is geslagen lyft              5
  gefrdendlc on hlyste, sw micel sw on re heorcnunge
  is. ic secge n gewislcor, t lc stemn by
  geworden of s mes clypunge and of re lyfte
  cnyssunge. se m drf t  clypunge, and so lyft
  by geslagen mid re clypunge and gewyr t stemne.                10
  lc stemn is oe andgytfullc oe gemenged. andgytfullc
  stemn is, e mid andgyte bi geclypod, swsw ys
  _arma uirumque cano_ #ic herige  wpnu and one
  wer#. gemenged stemn is, e bi btan andgyte, swylc
  sw is hryera gehlw and horsa hngung, hunda gebeorc,             15
  trowa brastlung ET CETERA.

1. 2 _f. OU_ 3 _T beginnt, doch steht_ 4^3--6^3 six _am ende der hs._ 4
literis _T_  con. _OT_, c. _DHhR_, com. _FU_ 5 stem: _F_  geslagan
_T_ 6 gefredenlic _FU_  :lyste _F_, lyfte _zu_ hlyfte _gebessert T_ 
_mit_ so muchel so _beginnt_ (_vorher einige buchstaben unleserlich_)
_W_  heornunge _D_ 7 i[wislucor et] _W_  gewislucor _T_  stefn
_h_ 8 mu _T_  and--9 clypunge _am rande 1. corr. F_ 8 . l.] es
mues _W_  lyfte _f. T_ 9 [cn.] _W_ 10 ismiten _W_  c[leopun]ge _W_
 gewur _H_  stmne _R_ 11 gemencged _FhR_  anitful[lic stefne]
_W_ 12 stem _H_ 13 heri[e eo wep]ne _W_  u _in_ wpnu _aus_ a _h_ 14
gemencged _FhR_  is stemn _O_  stem _H_  buton _hRT_ 15 hngnung
_U_ swulche so (?) [.....?] ne ilouh hundene _W_ 16 and treowa _T_  t
c._F_


  DE LITTERA.

  LITTERA is #stf# on englisc and is se lsta dl on bcum
  and untdledlc. w tdla  bc t cwydum and
  [[5]]
  syan  cwydas t dlum, eft  dlas t stfgefgum
  and syan  stfgefgu t stafum: onne bo
   stafas untdledlce; foran e nn stf ne by nht,
  gif h g on tw. lc stf hf ro ing: NOMEN,
  FIGVRA, POTESTAS, t is, #nama# and #hiw# and #miht#.               5

17 _berschrift f. TW_ 18 [l]itera _W_  boc _W_ 19 untodelendlic _H_,
-delenlic _W_  [tod.] _W_ 1 and eft _H_, e[f]t _W_  st[efifeien
and] _W_ 2 stfgefgu] stfgefegum _RU_ 3 untodlendlice _H_,
unto[delenliche] _W_  foron _R_ 4 haue[ reo] _W_  incg _R_, ing
(_zu_ ing _von neuerer hand_) _mit_ nomen _als ein worth_

   nama, h h gehten by: _a_, _b_, _c_. hiw, h h gesceapen
  by. miht, hwt h mge betwux rum stafum. slce
  on ldensprce synd ro and twentig stafa: _a_, _b_,
  _c_, _d_, _e_, _f_, _g_, _h_, _i_, _k_, _l_, _m_, _n_, _o_,
        _p_, _q_, _r_, _s_, _t_, _u_, _x_, _y_, _z_.
  of m syndon ff VOCALES, t synd #clypjendlce#:                 10
  _a_, _e_, _i_, _o_, _u_. s ff stafas towja heora naman urh
  h sylfe and btan m stafum ne mg nn word bon
  writen, and for  h synd QVINQVE VOCALES gehtene.
  t isum is genumen se grcisca _y_ for intingan grciscra
  namena, and se ylca _y_ is on engliscum gewritum swe              15
  gewunelc. ealle  re stafas syndon gehtene CONSONANTES,
  t is, #samod swgende#; foran e h swga
  mid m ff clypjendlcum. onne bo gyt of m
  samod swgendum sume SEMIVOCALES, t synd #healfclypjende#;
  sume syndon MVTAE, t synd #dumbe#.                                20

  DE SILLABA.

  SYLLABA is stfgefg on nre orunge geendod. _a domo_
  #fram hse#: hr is se _a_ for num stfgefge. _ab homine_          5
  #fram m menn#: hr is se _ab_ n stfgefg.
  hwlon by t stfgefg on num stfe, hwlon on
  twm, swsw w r sdon; hwlon on rm stafum:
  _arx_ #wghs#; hwlon on fowor: _pars_ #dl#; hwlon on
  ff: _stans_ #standende#; hwlon on syx: _stirps_ #stybb#           10
  oe #mg#.

ste]fiueih on ea[ne?] emunge iended _W_  sillaba _J_  ordunge _J_ 5

stefiueih _W_  for] fram _J_  (h)omine _H_ 6 from monne _W_  an

  DE DIPTONGIS.

  DYPTONGVS is twfeald swg oe twfeald stfgefg,
  and ra synd fowor: n on _ae_: _musae_, _poetae_; on isum
  namum synd  twegen stafas _a_ and _e_ t nre dyptongon           15
  [[8]]
  getealde. er dyptongon ys _au_: _aurum_ #gold#;
  ridda _eu_: _eurus_ #sasterne wind#; fora ys _oe_:
  _poena_ #wte#, _foenum_ #grs# oe #strow#. ne sprece
  w hr n mre be isum.

12 _berschr. f. W_  de _f. F_  dypt- _DFHRU_ 13  _W_  is twe-
_U_ 14 ra (-) _DFHhRU_, r _J_, er _W_  beo _W_  feower
_DFHhJRU_, IIII (_darber_ or _gl._) _W_  an _zu_ au _U_  on] :n (o
_ursprnglich rot_) _O_, _zu_ eu _U_  [e mus]e _W_   _O_, e, _dem
eine sptere hand_ o _vorgesetzt hat_, _U_  muse _zu_ mus(a) _v. a.
hd. F_  poeta _J_  issum _FJ_ 15 beo _W_  twygen _J_  e] u _W_
 diptongon _J_,  _W_ 1 dypto(n)gon _U_, diptonge (?) _W_  au] a and
u _W_ 2 ridde? _H, aber bis auf spuren des ersten und der beiden
letzten buchstaben weggerissen_  erus _J_  s. w. _in d. z. R_,
su[easterne wi]nd _W_  feore _J_, se f(e)ora _D_, se feore _H_ 3
fcenum (_correctur rot_) _O_  g. o. st. _in d. z. R_, gers  heih 
strau _W_  ore _U_  str(e)aw _J_ 4 w] ic _J_  issum_J_

  [[3 fcenum (_correctur rot_) _O_
    printed text has small c for expected o]]


  PRAEFATIO DE PARTIBVS ORATIONIS.                                     5

  PARTES ORATIONIS SVNT OCTO #eahta dlas synd ldensprce#:
  NOMEN, PRONOMEN, VERBVM, ADVERBIVM, PARTICIPIVM,
  CONIVNCTIO, PRAEPOSITIO, INTERIECTIO. NOMEN is #nama#, mid
  m w nemna ealle ing ger g synderlce g gemnelce.
  synderlce be genum naman: _Eadgarus_, _Aelwoldus_;               10
  gemnelce: _rex_ #cyning#, _episcopus_ #bisceop#. PRONOMEN
  is #s naman speljend#, s spela one naman,
  t  ne urfe tuwa hine nemnan. gif  cwest n:
  #hw lrde ?#, onne cwee ic: #Dnstn#.

5 _berschrift f. UW_ 6 _hier beginnt wider T_  [p. oration]is _W_ 
orationes _HO_  VIII (_darber_ to _gl._) _W_  eahta d. s. l. _in d.
z. R_  hta _T_, heihte _W_  dles _J_  beo _W_ 7 [aduerbium
p]ar[tic]ipium _W_ 8 mid--9 ing _auf r. D_ 9 [en we nemn]ed _W_ 
nmna _H_  ingc _J_  . g]  _W_  senderlice _J, dahinter_ i.
singulariter _W_  g]  _W_  mnelice _DHU, darber_ communiter _W_
10 [synd.--30^15 e] ende _W_  sender- _J_  nam(an) _R_  proprium
nomen _ber_ eadgarus _gl. U_ 11 apellatur __. rex _gl. U_  kyning
_Fh_, kynig _R_ 12 pronomen] m _durch ein loch verloren J_, omen _auf
r._ (_v. a. hd.?_) _F_  onne _J_  nama _J_ 13 tuwa] tua _J_, ta
_T_  nmnan _DH_  cwest _FhT_, cwyst _H_, cwyst _DJR_ 14
dustan_U_

  [[9 ... . g]  _W_ ... g]  _W_
    text has . g] without space both times]]

           #hw
  hdode ?# #h m hdode#: onne stent se #h# on                  15
  his naman stede and spela hine. eft, gif  xast:
  _quis hoc fecit?_ #hw dyde is?#, onne cwest : _ego
  [[9]]
  hoc feci_ #ic dyde is#: onne stent se #ic# on nes naman
  stede; _tu_ ##; _ille_ #s#. VERBVM is #word#, and word getcna
  weorc oe rwunge oe geafunge. weorc
  by, onne  cwest: _aro_ #ic erige#; _uerbero_ #ic swinge#.
  rwung by, onne  cwyst: _uerberor_ #ic eom beswungen#;          5
  _ligor_ #ic eom gebunden#. geafung by,
  onne  cwyst: _amor_ #ic eom gelufod#; _doceor_ #ic
  eom gelred#.

15 stnt _J_ 16 s(t)ede _H_  ax(a)st _1. corr. h_ 17 feci(t) _aus_
fecid _1. corr.? h_  cwestu _D_  cwyst _HR_, cwest _T_, cwyst
_F_, cwyst _hJ_ 1 feci: (t _rad._) _J_  dede _J_  stent _am rande
nachgetr. D_, stnt _J_ 2 u _von_ uerbum _auf rasur O_  is word _ber_
uerbum _R_  getcna] is _H_ 3 weorc oe _auf r. D_  rowung _J_ 4
cwyst _T_, cwest _R_, cwest _DFh_, cwyst _HJ_  :erige (h _rad.?_)
_F_, erie::: _h_  swincge _h_ 5 cwyst _HJR_, cwyst _Dh_  --8 gel.
_. in d. z. R_ 6 gebundon _J_ 7 cwyst _JR_, cwyst _DHh_

           ADVERBIVM is #wordes gefra#, foran
  e h nf nne fulfremednysse, bton h mid m
  worde bo. word gefyl his gene getcnunge mid                     10
  fullum andgyte. onne  cwyst: _scribo_ #ic wrte#,
  onne by r full andgyt. ADVERBIVM is _bene_ #wel#.
  hr nys n ful andgyt, bton  cwee word r t:
  _bene scribo_ #wel ic wrte#; _bene scribis_ #wel  wrtst#;
  _bene scribit_ #wel h wrt#; ET PLVRALITER #and menigfealdlce#:   15
  _male legimus_ #yfele w rda#; _melius legitis_
  #bet g rda#; _optime legunt_ #slost h rda#; ET
  CETERA.

gefel _D_, gefel _H_  hagene _H_ 11 onne--12 andgyt _erst von
moderner hand zugefgt U_ 11 cwyst _HJR_, cwyst _Dh_ 12 ar _T_ 13 nan

           PARTICIPIVM ys #dl nimend#. h nym nne
  dl of naman and erne of worde. of naman h nym
  CASVS, t is, #declinunge#, and of worde h nym tde              20
  and getcnunge. of him bm h nym getel and hiw.
  [[10]]
  _amans_ #lufjende# cym of m worde _amo_ #ic lufige#:
  onne nym h of m naman him ealle  syx CASVS:
  NOMINATIVVM, GENITIVVM, DATIVVM, ACCVSSATIVVM, VOCATIVVM,
  ABLATIVVM; ET PLVRALITER #and menigfealdlce#. es
  PARTICIPIVM is rora cynna: _hic amans uir_ #es lufjenda           5
  wer#; _haec amans femina_ #is lufjende wf#; _hoc
  amans mancipium_ #es lufjenda owa man#; ET CETERA.
  CONIVNCTIO is #geodnys# oe #fging#. es dl ne
  mg nht urh hine sylfne, ac h gefg tgdere
  ger g naman g word.

18 nimende _J_, nymende _U_  nne _DFHhJR_ 20 nim _fast ganz weg H_
21 getacnuncge _J_  getl _FT, davor rasur von etwa 5 buchst. F_ 1

  in ciuitatem?_ #hw rt int m port?#, onne cwe
  h: _rex et episcopus_ #se cyningc and se bisceop#.
  se _et_, t is, #and#, , is CONIVNCTIO: _ego et tu_ #ic and
  #. word h gefg us: _stat et loquitur_ #h stent
  and spryc#; ET CETERA. PRAEPOSITIO is #foresetnyss#.               15
  s by geod naman and worde and stent fre on
  foreweardan. _ab illo homine_ #fram m men#: hr is
  se _ab_ PRAEPOSITIO. _apud regem sum_ #ic eom mid m
  cyninge#: hr is se _apud_ PRAEPOSITIO. _ad regem equito_
  #ic rde t cyninge#, ET CETERA.

           INTERIECTIO is                                            20
  [[11]]
  #betwuxworpennyss#. se dl l betwux rum wordum and
  geswutela s mdes styrunge. _heu_ geswutela mdes
  srnysse: _heu mihi_ #wmm#. _pape_ geswutela wundrunge,
  _atat_ geswutela gan, _racha_ geswutela bylignysse,
  ET CETERA. witodlce on isum eahta dlum is                         5
  eal ldensprc belocen, and t englisc gewrlc t
  eallum m dlum, swsw w n sceortlce trahtnodon.

_erstes_ i _von_ interiectio _auf rasur O_  betwyx- _R_ 1 -pennesnys
_H_, --yss: _F_  lig _F_, bi _J_, by _O_  betweox _T_  _vor_
and _r. von etwa 10 buchstaben R_ 2 h. getacna m. _J_ 3 sar:nisse _U_,
-nesse _HJR_  w me _H_, wa me _J_  r _in_ wundrunge _in folge eines
loches fast ganz verschwunden O_ 4 g. r. gesw. _f. H_ 5 -nesse _HJU_ 
yssum _T_ 6 ealle _T_  _am rande_ vach. getcna bism:runge. pro
dolor wla _von spterer hand F_  -sprce _J_  belocon _F_ 
nglisc _D_  gewrlh (- _h_) _FhR_, gehwrlc _TU_ 7 trahtnodan
_R_, trahtnonodon_U_

   on isum eahta dlum synd  mstan and  mihtigostan
  NOMEN ET VERBVM, t is, #nama and word#. mid
  m naman w nemna ealle ing and mid m worde                    10
  w spreca be eallum ingum. sume naman synd PRIMITIVA,
  t synd #frumcennede# oe #fyrmyste#, swsw
  ys _scola_ on englisc #scl#, _mons_ #dn#, _ciuitas_ #ceaster#.
  sume synd DIRIVATIVA, t synd,  e cuma of rum
  namum: _scolasticus_ #s e on scle ys#, _montanus_ #dnlendisc#,  15
  _ciuis_ #ceastergewara#. sume synd gene
  naman, swsw is #adgr#, #Dnstn#; sume gemnelce:
  #cyning#, #bisceop#, _homo_ #man#.

   e bo tdlede fram m gemnelcum.

  DE GENERIBVS.

  on ntenum.

  [[21]]
  INCIPIVNT QVINQVE DECLINATIONES NOMINVM.


  OMNIA NOMINA QVIBVS LATINA VTITVR ELOQVENTIA, QVINQVE
  DECLINATIONIBVS INFLECTVNTVR #ealle naman, ra
  e ldensprc brc, bo gebgede on ff declinungum#.              5
  so forme DECLINATIO, t is, so forme
  #declinung#, maca hire GENITIVVM on _ae_: _huius poetae_
  #ises sceopes#. so er DECLINATIO geenda hire GENITIVVM
  on langne _i_: _huius episcopi_ #ises bisceopes#.
  so ridde DECLINATIO went hire GENITIVVM on scortne _is_:         10
  _huius regis_ #ises cyninges#. so fore DECLINATIO
  maca hire GENITIVVM on langne _us_: _huius exercitus_ #ises
  heres#. so ffte DECLINATIO gebg hire GENITIVVM on _e_
  and _i_ tdledlce: _huius rei_ #ises inges#.

1. 2 uis quinque declinationum hic ostenditur _J_, de de(cli)nationibus
_T_  qu(i)nque _D_  nomnum _O_ 3 omna _J_  latiua _H_  utitur
_ber getilgtem_ uat _F_  eloquia _H_ 4 ealle--6 decl. _in d. z. R_
 ealla _H_  ara _J_ 5 (e) _R_  -sprc: _hR_, -sprece _F_ 
gebgede _T_  of _JT_ 6 I. seo _U_  se forma _J_  pt--7 declinung
_f. T_  se _HU_  forma _H_ 7 geniti(u)um _O_, uum _auf r. F_  on
_f. J, auf r. F_ 8 . sc. _f. T_  isses _J_  se(o) oer _H_, seoer

  I. So forme geendung is on scortne _a_ . on re
  [[33]]
  geendja grcisce naman and NEVTRI GENERIS: NOMINATIVO

  #ises locrftes#, DATIVO _huic poemati_ #isum locrfte#,

  _o poema_ #al  locrft#, ABLATIVO _ab hoc poemate_             5
  #fram isum locrfte#; ET PLVRALITER NOMINATIVO
  _haec poemata_ #s locrftas#, GENITIVO _horum poematum_
  #issera locrfta#, DATIVO _his poematibus_ #isum
  locrftum#, ACCVSATIVO _haec poemata_ #s lodcrftas#,
  VOCATIVO _o poemata_ #al g locrftas#,                         10
  ABLATIVO _ab his poematibus_ #fram isum locrftum#.
  ealsw g s naman: _hoc cauma_ #swlo#, _thema_ #antimber#,
  _scema_ #hiw#, _onoma_ #nama#, _malagma_ #clia#,

  _baptisma_ #fulluht#, _dogma_ #lr#, _scisma_ #geflit# ET HIS SIMILIA
  #and isum gelce#.

  [[34]]
  II. So er geendung is on scortne _e_, and  naman,
  e on re geendja, synd ealle NEVTRI GENERIS:
  _hoc sedile_ #es hlda#, _huius sedilis_, _huic sedili_,
          _hoc sedile_,
  _o sedile_, _ab hoc sedili_; ET PLVRALITER _haec sedilia_, _horum
  sedilium_, _his sedilibus_ ET CETERA. ealsw g s: _hoc           5
  monile_ #es myne#, _cubile_ #denn#, _ouile_ #owd#, _praesaepe_
  #binn#, _mare_ #s#. and ealle h geendja ABLATIVVM on _i_,
  bton _gausape_ #bodcl#, _ab hoc gausape_, and _rete_ #nett#,
  _ab hoc rete_.

1 _kein absatz FHhRW_  II _f. TW_  So--2 ealle] on e correptam _T_
 se oer endunge _W_  [sc.--2 ]ere ende _W_  sceortne _DFhJRU_ 2
sint _U_, beo _W_ 3 sedi[le--se]dili _W_  . hl.] #ceaire# _gl. T_
 es _am rande ds. hd. H_  hlyda _J_, hlede _H_ 4 [hec--5 ce]tera
_W_ 4 sidilia _J_ 5 sidilium _O_  sedilibus _aus_ sidi- _O, aus_ sede-
_a. hd. F_ 6 _ber_ monile _von a. hd._ #nusche dor# _F_, nuscia i.
munimentum sobrietatis in pectore _gl. U_  . m.] myneie _gl. T_ 
es _f. W_  [cub.--presepe] _W_  cubili _O_  denn _gl. T_  o.

  FEMININVM on _a_: _haec fidicina_, _haec tibicina_. ealle 
  re synd NEVTRI GENERIS: _hoc nomen_ #es nama#, _huius            10
  nominis_, _huic nomini_, _hoc nomen_, _o nomen_, _ab hoc nomine_;
  ET PLVRALITER _haec nomina_, _horum nominum_, _his nominibus_
  ET CETERA.

  COMPARATIVVS _hoc iustius_ #is rihtwsre#. cwe onne
  tgdere, gif  wylle, _hic et haec iustior et hoc iustius_,

  XXXII. IN VS CORREPTAM. on scortne _us_ geendja                    10
  s naman: _hic lepus_ #es hara#, _huius leporis_; _hic et
  haec et hoc uetus_ (lc, hwt #eald# s), _huius ueteris_; _haec
  pecus_ #is nten#, _huius pecudis_. t is ac NEVTRI GENERIS:
  _hoc pecus_, _huius pecoris_. s re sind NEVTRI GENERIS:
  _hoc opus_ #is weorc#, _huius operis_; _hoc uellus_ #is           15
  fls#, _huius uelleris_. ealsw g s: _uiscus_ #inno#,
  _uisceris_; _pondus_ #byren# oe #wge#, _ponderis_; _holus_
  [[59]]
  #wyrt#, _holeris_; _ulcus_ #wund#, _ulceris_; _uulnus_ #wund#,
        _uulneris_;
  _latus_ #sde#, _lateris_; _munus_ #lc#, _muneris_; _honus_
  #sam# oe #byren#, _honeris_; _genus_ #kynn#, _generis_;
  _sidus_ #tungel#. sume habba scortne _o_: _tempus_ #tma#,
  _temporis_; _timpus_ #unwencge#, _timporis_; _litus_ #strand#,      5
  _litoris_; _corpus_ #lc# oe #lchama#, _corporis_; _pectus_
        #brost#,
  _pectoris_; _stercus_ #meox#, _stercoris_; _frigus_ #cle#,
        _frigoris_;
  _nemus_ #holt#, _nemoris_; _fenus_ #borh#, _fenoris_ VEL _feneris_;
  _pignus_, _pignoris_, #tudder#; _pignus_, _pigneris_, #wed# ET CETERA.

  XXXIII. IN VS PRODVCTAM. on langne _us_ geendja                    10
  s naman: _hic mus_ #os ms#, _huius muris_; COMMVNIA:
  _hic et haec sus_ #swn#, _huius suis_; _hic et haec grus_ #cran#,
  _huius gruis_; GENERIS NEVTRI: _hoc rus_ #is land#, _huius
  ruris_; _hoc thus_ #es str#, _huius thuris_. ealsw _crus_        14
  #sceanca#, _cruris_; _ius_ #lagu#, _iuris_; _plus_ #mre#, _pluris_;
  and ealle s habba langne _u_ on gebgedum casum.
  [[60]]
  bton _gruis_ and _suis_; foran e nn _u_ ne by lang on
  re stwe tforan rum VOCALEM. is ac t witenne,
  t _plus_ is NEVTRI GENERIS on m forman case, and on
  m rum ff casum hyt by rora cynna: _hi et hae
  plures et haec plura_ VEL _pluria_.  naman, e weaxa              5
  on GENITIVVM,  synd FEMININI GENERIS: _haec seruitus_ #es
  owdm#, _huius seruitutis_. ealsw g s: _incus_
  #anfilt#, _incudis_; _uirtus_ #miht#, _uirtutis_; _salus_ #hl#,
        _salutis_;
  _senectus_ #yld#, _senectutis_; _iuuentus_ #jugu#, _iuuentutis_;
  _tellus_ #eore#, _telluris_; _palus_ #gyrwe fen#, _paludis_ (lang  10
  _u_ on eallum casum).

  XXXVII. IN ANS. on _ans_ geendja s naman:
  GENERIS MASCVLINI _hic quadrans_ #es feorling# oe                5
  #foran dl inges#, _huius quadrantis_; GENERIS COMMVNIS
  _hic et haec infans_ #unsprecende cild#; GENERIS
  FEMININI _haec glans_ #is ceren#, _huius glandis_. _amans_
  #lufigende# is ger g nama g PARTICIPIVM, _amantis_.
  on issere geendunge g ealle PARTICIPIA PRIMAE CONIVGATIONIS,     10
  t synd ealle #dl nymende re forman
  geodnysse#, PRAESENTIS TEMPORIS #andwerdre tde#.
  of m worde _amo_ #ic lufige# cym _hic et haec et hoc
  amans_ #es and os and is lufigende#, _huius
  amantis_, _huic amanti_, _hunc et hanc amantem et hoc amans_,       15
  _o amans_, _ab hoc et ab hac et ab hoc amante VEL amanti_;
  [[62]]
  ET PLVRALITER _hi et hae amantes et haec amantia_, _horum
  et harum et horum amantium_, _his amantibus_ ET CETERA.
  ealsw g s: _stans_ #standende#, _stantis_; _arans_ #erigende#,
  _ambulans_ #gangende#, _laborans_ #swincende#,
  _flans_ #blwende# and re ungerme.                                5

  rst geedcucod; and se fugel getcna rne rist on
  m endenxtan dge), _huius Fenicis_; GENERIS FEMININI:            15
  _haec cornix_ #os ce#; _haec ceruix_ #es hnecca#, _huius
  ceruicis_; _hic_ VEL _haec radix_ #es wyrtruma#, _huius radicis_;
  [[71]]
  TRIVM GENERVM: _hic et haec et hoc felix_ #geslig#,
  _huius felicis_; _hic et haec et hoc pernix_ #swyft#,
        _huius pernicis_;
  _haec nutrix_ #os fstormdor#, _huius nutricis_;
  _haec uictrix_ #os sigefste#, _huius uictricis_ and ealle
  re yllce, e cuma of werlcum namum: _hic cantor_               5
  #es sangere#, _haec cantrix_ #os sangystre#; _lector_
  #rdere#, _lectrix_ #rdestre#; _doctor_ #lrow#, _doctrix_
  #lrestre# ET SIMILIA. s bo geodde t NEVTRVM on
  gebgedum casum, swsw ys gecweden _uictricia tollite
  signa_ #nyma  sigefstan mearca#: nis sw ah                   10
  gewunelic _hoc uictrix_, ac on m gebgedum casum.

  [[76]]
  DE PLVRALI GENITIVO.

  Gif hwm twna be m menigfealdan GENITIVO,
  onne secge w hr scortlce be m earfoostan. _supplex_
  #admd# oe #loten# ys rora cynna: _horum et harum
  et horum supplicum_; _supplicium_ ys #wte#. _artifex_ #crftica#,   5
  _horum artificum_ #issera crftycena#; _artificium_
  is #crft#. _iudex_ #dma#, _horum iudicum_ #issera dmena#;
  _iudicium_ is #dm#. _parens_ #fder# oe #mdor#,
  _horum parentum_. _uigil_ #wacol#, _horum uigilum_. _memor_
  #gemyndig#, _horum memorum_ #gemyndigra#. _fons_ #wyll#,            10
  _fontium_. _mons_ #dn#, _montium_. _frons_ #foreweard hafod#,
  _frontium_. _pars_ #dl#, _partium_. _ars_ #crft#, _artium_.

1 _berschrift f. JTW_  plurari _OU_ 2 tima _J_  an (-) _DFhO_ 
mnig- _HJRTUW_  -dam _U_ 3 an _O_  -estan _U_, r _aus e. a. D,
darber_ dificiliores _gl. W_  (s _. rasur v. a. hd._)uplex _F_
4--77^11 _. in d. z. T_  alotyn _TU_ 5 supplic:um (i _rad._) _O_ 
(supplicium) _corr. U_  is wite _gl. R_ 5.6 crftca _DFHRW_ (t _auf
r. R_), crfta _J_ 6 horum _aus_ harum _H_  artifi::cum (ci _r._) _D_,
artificium _T_  . cr. _f. W_  crfticena _U_, crftcena _DFHhR_,
crftena _J_, crftigra _T_  artificum _JO_ 7 is crft _gl. R_  is
dema _gl. R_  iudicium (_zu_ -cum _hJ_) _hJT_  . d. _f. W_ 8 is dom
_gl. R_  f. o. m. _gl. R_  ys fder _U_ 9 uigilium _JT_ 10
gemyndigra _f. W_  well _D_, weall (_und darber_ will _corr._) _U_ 11
foncium _W_  montium _aus_ moncium _W_  forewerd h. _J_, forheaued

    line number missing]]

   _arx_ #wghs#, _arcium_. _urbs_ #burh#, _urbium_. _hiems_ #winter#,

  is #angyn#. _municeps_ #burhealdor#, _municipum_; _municipium_      15

  _follis_ #bylig#, _follium_. _caedes_ #sliht# oe #slege#, _caedium_.

  DE QVARTA DECLINATIONE.

  QVARTA DECLINATIO HABET TERMINATIONES DVAS #so fore
  declinung hf tw geendunga#, _us_ and _u_. on
  _us_ geendja MASCVLINA NOMINA, and on _u_ befealla
  NEVTRA. os declinung g us: NOMINATIVO _hic sensus_              5
  #is andgyt#, GENITIVO _huius sensus_ #ises andgytes#,
  DATIVO _huic sensui_ #isum andgyte#, ACCVSATIVO
  _hunc sensum_ #is andgyt#, VOCATIVO _o sensus_ #al 
  andgyt#, ABLATIVO _ab hoc sensu_ #fram isum andgyte#;
  ET PLVRALITER NOMINATIVO _hi sensus_ #s andgytu#, GENITIVO        10
  _horum sensuum_ #issera andgyta#, DATIVO _his sensibus_
  #isum andgytum#, ACCVSATIVO _hos sensus_ #s
  andgytu#, VOCATIVO _o sensus_ #al g andgytu#, ABLATIVO
  _ab his sensibus_ #fram isum andgytum#.

  DE NVMERO.

  NVMERVS is #getel#, SINGVLARIS ET PLVRALIS #nfeald
  oe menigfeald#. nfeald getel ys on num: _homo_                   5
  #n mann#. menigfeald getel ys _homines_ #menn#. and
  ealle  eahta PARTES habba s tw getel: witodlce
  gene naman habba nfeald getel and nabba menigfeald.
  ac sunne and mna sindon nfealdes geteles.
  sindon ac manega re naman, e fter ldensprce                  10
  nabba menigfeald getel: MASCVLINI GENERIS s: _sanguis_
  #bld# (ac sw ah on hlgum bcum w rda _uirum
  sanguinum_), _puluis_ #dst#, _fumus_ #smc#, _fimus_ #scern#,
  _limus_ #lm#; GENERIS FEMININI: _pax_ #sybb#, _lux_ #loht#, _pix_

  _penum_ #hddern#, _uulgus_ #ceorlfolc#, _pelagus_ #wds#,
  _uirus_ #wyrms#. and lc ra inga, e man wih on

  DE FIGVRA.

  FIGVRA is #hiw# on namum and on rum dlum and
  fter DONATVM, m lrowe, synd tw FIGVRA: SIMPLEX,
  t is, #nfeald# ET COMPOSITA, t is, #gefged#. nfeald
  hiw is _decens_ #geslc# oe #rwure#, _potens_                 10
  #mihtig#. gefged hiw by, t e by of twm dlum
  oe of m gefged: _indecens_ #unslc# oe #ungedafenlc#,
  _inpotens_ #unmihtig#; and h bo gefgede
  on fower wsan: rest of twm ansundum dlum: _iniustus_
  #unrihtws#; _in_ is PRAEPOSITIO and _iustus_ is nama.              15
  eft by gefged of twm tbrocenum dlum _beniuolus_
  #wel willende#; eft of ansundum dle and tbrocenum
  [[88]]
  _inimicus_ #fond#, _insipiens_ #unws#; eft of tbrocenum
  dle and ansundum _impius_ #rlas#, _efferus_ #re#.

12 _kein absatz_  naman _aus_ namon _a. hd.? h_  synd _T_, beo _W_

    text has mislice]]

  Sume synd gecwedene TRIPTOTA,  habba r ungelce

  re re declinunge on nfealdum getele: _hoc templum_

  [[92]]
  INCIPIT PRONOMEN.


  PRONOMEN EST PARS ORATIONIS, QVAE PRO NOMINE PROPRIO
  VNIVSCVIVSQVE ACCIPITVR PERSONASQVE FINITAS RECIPIT. PRONOMEN
  ys #naman speljend, n dl ldensprce,
  s by underfangen for genum naman, and                             5
  h underfh hdas mid fulre gewissunge.# es
  dl, t is PRONOMEN, hf syx ACCIDENTIA, t synd
  syx #gelimp#. him gelimp SPECIES, t is, #hiw#; PERSONA,
  t is, #hd#; and GENVS, t is, #cynn#; and FIGVRA, t
  is, #nfeald hiw oe gefged#; and NVMERVS, t is,                10
  #getel#; and CASVS #gebgednyss#. w secga n gewislcor
  be ison.

[vnius]c. _W_, un(i)us- _U_, unus- _DHJ_  finita _O_ 4 pronomen _in d.
z._, ys n. sp. _gl. R_  n. sp. _f. T_  namann _R_, (na)man _H_, nama
_O_  speligen _R_  an _usw. in d. z. R_  lden- _J_ 6 gewisunge

in d. z. T_  beo _W_ 8 syx _f. O_  him g. _f. T_  belimp _O_,
belimp _U_, gelimpa _urspr._ (_aber_ a _getilgt_) _F_  .i. qualitas
_ber_ species _D und 1. corr. F_  --10 . is hiw (had, cynn, a. h.,
getel) _gl. R, f. T_ 8.9 p. .i. hod _W_ 9.10 and _f. HJ_ 10 nfeald
_f. H_  o. g. _in d. z. R, f. T_  oer _W_  . is] .i. _W_ 11

  mid Grcum n mid Ldenwarum for m gescede,

  #n#. onne cym of m DIRIVATIVVM _tuus_ #n#: _tuus
  equus_ #n hors#, _tui equi_ #nes horses# and sw for            5
  fter re re declinunge. GENERIS FEMININI _tua uilla_
  #n tn#, _tuae uillae_ #nes tnes# and sw for fter
  re forman declinunge. GENERIS NEVTRI _tuum uerbum_
  #n word#, _tui uerbi_ #nes wordes# and sw for fter
  NEVTRI GENERIS.                                                     10

3 _kein absatz_   _f. T_  and--by _f. DH_  b[i--4 _2._ tuus]

angefgt F_, inum _DHU, f. T_  an _T_  diriuatiua _T_  --9 _.

  Se frumcenneda _tu_ maca his menigfealde getel _uos_.
  onne cuma of his GENITIVO _uestri_ tw DIRIVATIVA: _uester_
  #ower# and _uestras_ #ower landes mann#. _uester bos_
  #ower oxa#, _uestri bouis_ #owres oxan# and sw for,
  swsw _noster_. FEMININI _uestra uestis_ #ower raf# and          15
  sw for, swsw _nostra_. GENERIS NEVTRI _uestrum iudicium_
  #ower dm#, _uestri iudicii_ #owres dmes# and
  sw for fter NEVTRI GENERIS.

  DE FIGVRA.

  FIGVRA is gecweden on englisc #hiw# oe #gefgednyss#.             20
  ra synt tw: SIMPLEX #nfeald# ET COMPOSITA #and gefged#.
  [[106]]
  s PRONOMINA bo gefgede us urh sume
  CASVS: _iste_ and _hic_ bo tgdere gefgede on rm casum
  us: _istic_ #es#, _istunc_ #isne#, _ab istoc_ #fram isum#.
  FEMININVM _istaec_ #os#, _istanc_ #s#, _ab istac_ #fram issere#.
  nis hr nn menigfeald getel. NEVTRVM _istoc iudicium_               5
  #es dm#, _istoc_ #isne#, _ab istoc_ #fram isum#. hr
  is menigfeald getel: _istaec iudicia_ #s dmas#, _istaec_
  ACCVSSATIVVS, _istaec_ VOCATIVVS. ADVERBIVM _hic_ #hr#; re
  gefgede ADVERBIA: _adhuc_ #gyt# (_lege adhuc_ #rd gyt#), _abhinc_
  #heonon#.                                                           10

  DE NVMERO.                                                          15

  NVMERVS is #getel#, SINGVLARIS #nfeald# ET PLVRALIS #and
  menigfeald#. nfeald getel by on isum parte _ego_ #ic#,
  _tu_ ##, _ille_ #h#, and menigfeald getel bi _nos_ #w#,
        _uos_ #g#,
  _illi_ #hg#. sume hg bo gres geteles: _idem homo_
  [[109]]
  #se ylca man# and _idem homines_ # ylcan men#. sume bo
  gres cynnes: _haec ancilla_ #os wyln# and menigfealdlce
  _haec mancipia_ #s wealas#.

            seofon DIRIVATIVA
  PRONOMINA, t synd #ofgangendlce naman speligendan#,
  habba twfeald getel, n wiinnan, er witan.                    5
  gif  xast: _cuius sunt hi libri?_ #hws synd s bc?#
  and ic cwee on lden: _mei sunt_ #mne hg synd#, onne
  by on m forman stfgefge _me_ nfeald getel, and on
  m rum stfgefge _i_ bi menigfeald getel. ealsw
  _tua uerba sunt_ #ne word hit synd#: on m _tu_ by              10
  nfeald getel and on m _a_ menigfeald. hg habba ac
  ealle twegen hdas and tw cynn: n hd and n cynn
  by on m hlforde, e cwe _meus_ #mn#, and er hd
  and er cynn by on m hte, e h embe sprec,
  foran e t forme stfgefg ys rora cynna: MASCVLINVM           15
  and FEMININVM and NEVTRVM, and t er stfgefg
  ys wendendlc fram cynne t cynne: _meus ager_ #mn
  cer#, _mea terra_ #mn land#, _meum aratrum_ #mn sul#.
  h synd ac gecwedene POSSESSIVA, t synd #gegnigendlce#,
  foran e h getcnja oftost hta, ac n sw ah                  20
  [[110]]
  symle: gif ic cwee _meus dominus_ #mn hlford# oe
  _meus pater_ #mn fder#, ne by r nn ht geswutelod.

seofan _hRT_, VII^to _W_  _erstes_ i _in_ diriuatiua _aus_ u _R_,
diriuat _W_ 4 t--speligendan] _f. T, in d. z. R_  beo _W_ 5 hi
habba _J_  getl _FT_  -innon _T_  -uton _T_ 6 hii _W_, (hi) _U_
 (li)bri _H_  --7 _. f. TW_  synt _U_  a _O_ 7 u cwest _W_ 
on lden _f. TW_  min _R_ 8 on] of _DHU_  getl _FT, auf r. D_ 
and--9 getel _f. U_ 9 menig (feald _f._) _O_  getl _FT_  ealsw--15
e] et similia _T_ 10 t _in_ tua _ganz_, u _z. t. weg H_  _. f. W_ 
sint _U_ 11 getl _F_  a by mnigfeald getel _J_ 12 ealla _H_ 13 on]

  Gyt syndon sume naman, e wron unrihtlce getealde                  5
  betwux naman speljendum, foran e naman speljend
  ne mg habban  getcnunga, e h habba. n
  ra ys _qualis_ and _quale_ #hwylc#, t getcna ro
  ingc: INTERROGATIONEM, t is, #xunge# and INFINITIONEM
  #endelasnysse# ET RELATIONEM #and edlesunge#. gif                  10
  ic cwee: _qualis est rex?_ #hwylc ys se cyning?#, onne
  by h INTERROGATIVVM, t is, #xjendlc#. gif ic cwee:
  _nescio, qualis est rex_ #nt ic, hwylc se cyning is#,
  onne by se _qualis_ INFINITIVVM, t is, #ungeendigendlc#.
  gif ic cwee: _tu scis bene, qualis est_ # wst wel,              15
  hwylc h is#, onne by hit RELATIVVM, t ys, #edlesendlc#.
  _talis_ and _tale_ #swylc# andwyrd m rum.

  INCIPIT DE VERBO.                                                    5


  VERBVM EST PARS ORATIONIS CVM TEMPORE ET PERSONA SINE
  CASV AVT AGERE ALIQVID AVT PATI AVT NEVTRVM SIGNIFICANS,
  VERBVM #ys word, n dl ldensprce mid tde and
  hde btan case getcnjende oe sum ing
  t dnne oe sum ing t rwigenne oe                           10
  nor#. VERBVM HABET SEPTEM ACCIDENTIA #word hf
  seofon gelimplce ing#. him gelimp SIGNIFICATIO,
  t ys, #getcnung#, hwt t word getcnige, dde
  oe rwunge oe nor; TEMPVS #td#, MODVS #gemet#,
  SPECIES #hiw#, FIGVRA #gefgednyss#, CONIVGATIO #geodnyss#,       15
  PERSONA #hd#, NVMERVS #getel#. w wylla n
  secgan endebyrdlce and gewislce be eallum isum.

  SIGNIFICATIO ys #getcnung#, hwt t word getcnige.
  lc fulfremed word geenda on _o_ oe on _or_.
  on _o_ geendja ACTIVA VERBA, t synd #ddlce word#,

  d nne _r_ t isum wordum, onne bo h PASSIVA,

  DE TEMPORE.

  TEMPVS ACCIDIT VERBO #td gelimp worde# for getcnunge
  mislcra dda. fter gecynde synd ro tda
  on lcum worde, e fulfremed by: PRAESENS TEMPVS ys
  #andwerd td#: _sto_ #ic stande#; PRAETERITVM TEMPVS ys             15
  #forgewiten td#: _steti_ #ic std#; FVTVRVM TEMPVS is
  #twerd td#: _stabo_ #ic stande n rihte# oe #on sumne
  [[124]]
  tman#. ac sw ah wse lrowas tdldon one PRAETERITVM
  TEMPVS, t is, #one forgewitenan tman#,
  on ro: on PRAETERITVM INPERFECTVM, t is #unfulfremed
  forgewiten#, swilce t ing bo ongunnen
  and ne bo fuldn: _stabam_ #ic std#. PRAETERITVM PERFECTVM         5
  ys #forgewiten fulfremed#: _steti_ #ic std
  fullce#. PRAETERITVM PLVSQVAMPERFECTVM is #forgewiten
  mre, onne fulfremed#, foran e hit ws gefyrn
  gedn: _steteram_ #ic std gefyrn#. for is se forgewitena
  tma on ro tdled, foran e nht ne by                         10
  sw gemyndelc on gecynde, sw t ys, t gedn by.

toweard _HJU_, -weart _D_  ic st. _f. T_  riht _W_  o. on

  DE MODIS.

  MODVS ys #gemet# oe #re sprce wse#, and ra
  synd ff. INDICATIVVS ys #gebcnjendlc#: mid m w
  geswutelja, hwt w d oe re menn. ic cwee                   15
  n: _lego_ #ic rde#; r bi mn dd geswutelod. and
  is MODVS ys fulfremed on eallum tdum and on eallum
  [[125]]
  hdum and ys for fyrmest. t er MODVS ys IMPERATIVVS,
  t ys, #bebodendlc#: mid m gemete w
  hta re menn dn sum ing oe sum ing rwjan.
  _lege_ #rd #; _legat_ #rde h#; _flagella istum puerum_ #beswing
  is cild#; _flagelletur_ #s h beswungen#.

  #h seg#, oe menigfealdlce _dicunt_ #h secga#. se

  t fultume PRONOMEN #naman speljend#: _ille dicit_.

7 _berschrift_ (_raum dafr W_) _f. AJW_ 8 _kein absatz J_  [n]umerus
_A_, [numeru]s _W_  [uterque s]ing. _W_ 9 getel--10 menigf. _gl. R, f.

  DE CONIVGATIONIBVS.

  CONIVGATIONES VERBORVM QVATTVOR SVNT SECVNDVM PRISCIANVM.
  CONIVGATIO VERBORVM ys #worda geodnys#, and                       15
  ra sind fower fter Priscianes tcinge. naman habba
  [[130]]
  ff DECLINATIONES, and word habba fower CONIVGATIONES.
  DECLINATIO mg bon gecweden #gebgednys#,
  foran e on re bo  naman gebgede fram case
  t case. CONIVGATIO mg bon gecweden #geodnys#,
  foran e on re bo manega word geodde on nre                  5
  declinunge.

spterer hd.?_) _F_  coniugatione _CU_, -tio (_von moderner hd. zu_
-tione _D_) _DH_ 14 _kein absatz JT_  coniunctiones _J_, [coniu]g.

  and hd and tde, onne by hit geendod sprc: _amare
  uolo_ #ic wylle n lufjan#; _amare uolebam_ #ic wolde
  lufjan#; _sciui te aliquando amasse deum_ #ic wiste, t
   hwlon lufodest god#. FVTVRO _amatum ire_ VEL                    10
  _amaturum esse_ #lufjan#; _uis amatum ire_ #wylt  faran
  lufjan#; _uenatum pergo_ #ic fare huntjan#; _uis doctum ire_

  _bibitum pergo_ #ic gange drincan#; ET CETERA.

  e h synd gelce dl nymendum on gebgedum casum.
  h synd ac gecwedene GERVNDIA of m worde

  _gero_ #ic bere#, foran e h bera manega andgytu. h
  synd ac gehtene SOPINA. SOPINVM ys #pp wend#, and
  h synd p wende and brde, foran e h underf fela
  andgytu, swsw w hr beforan sdon. DVO PARTICIPIA
  VENIVNT A VERBO ACTIVO #twegen dl nymende cuma                     5
  of m ddlcum worde#, PRAESENTIS TEMPORIS, VT

           TEMPORE FVTVRO _utinam
  amer_ #al gif ic bo gelufod gyt#, _utinam ameris_
  #al gif  byst#, _utinam ametur_ #al gif h by#;
  ET PLVRALITER _utinam amemur_ #al gyf w bo gelufode
  gyt#, _utinam amemini_ #al gyf g bo#, _utinam                   5
  amentur_ #al gyf h bo#. SVBIVNCTIVO MODO _cum amer_
  #onne ic eom n gelufod#, _cum ameris_ #onne 
  eart#, _cum ametur_ #onne h ys#; ET PLVRALITER _cum
  amemur_ #onne w n synd gelufode#, _cum amemini_
  #onne g synd#, _cum amentur_ #onne h synd#.

t _in_ tempore _erst von spterer hd. F_ 1. 2 [ut. amer] _W_ 2 amarer
_T_  amaris _T_ 3 _1._ gif _f. O_  byst] :: _F_  ame[tur eala] _W_

  DE SECVNDA CONIVGATIONE.

  ra worda, e geenda on _eo_, and se er hd on _es_,

  III. So ridde PRAETERITVM geenda on _si_: _suadeo_                5
  #ic tyhte#, _suasi_ #ic tyhte#, _suasum_ #getyht#; _rideo_ #ic
  hliche#, _risi_, _risum_; _ardeo_ #ic byrne#, _arsi_, _arsum_;
        _indulgeo_
  #ic forgyfe# oe #miltsige#, _indulsi_, _indulsum_
  oe _indultum_; _algeo_ #ic clige#, _alsi_, _alsum_; _mulgeo_ #ic
  melce#, _mulsi_, _mulsum_ oe _mulctum_; _fulgeo_ #ic scne#,      10
  _fulsi_, _fulsum_; _tergeo_ VEL _tergo_ #ic wpige#, _tersi_,
        _tersum_;
  _turgeo_ #ic tswelle#, _tursi_, _tursum_; _urgeo_ #ic rafige#,
  _ursi_ (_ursum_ is #bera#: _hic ursus_ #es bera#, _hunc ursum_);
  _torqueo_ #ic wre#, _torsi_, _tortum_, ac  ealdan cwdon
  _torsum_; of m gefged _distorqueo_ #ic twre#, _distorsi_,     15
  _distortum_; _contorqueo_ #ic samod rwe#, _contorsi_, _contortum_;
  _extorqueo_ #ic of wringe# _extorsi_, _extortum_; _maneo_
  [[156]]
  #ic wunige#, _mansi_, _mansum_; _haereo_ #ic t geode#
  oe #ic t clifige#, _haesi_, _haesum_, and of m gefgede
  on m ylcan andgyte _adhaereo_, _inhaereo_; _iubeo_ #ic hte#,
  _iussi_ #ic ht#, _iussum_; ET SIMILIA.

           OPTATIVO MODO TEMPORE PRAESENTI ET PRAETERITO

  INPERFECTO _utinam docerer_, _docereris_, _doceretur_; ET PLVRALITER
  _utinam doceremur_, _doceremini_, _docerentur_. EODEM

  _utinam docti fuissemus_, _fuissetis_, _fuissent_. EODEM MODO
  TEMPORE FVTVRO _utinam docear_, _docearis_, _doceatur_; ET PLVRALITER
  _utinam doceamur_, _doceamini_, _doceantur_. SVBIVNCTIVO

  _docearis_, _doceatur_; ET PLVRALITER _cum doceamur_, _doceamini_,
  _doceantur_. EODEM MODO TEMPORE PRAETERITO INPERFECTO

        _cum doceremur_,
  _doceremini_, _docerentur_.

  #rce m  bc#), _dirigo_ #ic tce sumum men

  #ic smiige#, _cudi_ VEL _cusi_, _cusum_ (of m by gecweden       10

  [[179]]
  _proiectum_; _inicio_ #ic on wurpe#; _conicio_ #ic samod
  wurpe# oe #ic rde swefn#; _capio_ #ic gef#, _cepi_ #ic
  gefngc#, _captum_ #gelht# (of m is _captiuus_ #hftlingc#

  #ic onginne#, _incepi_, _inceptum_; _recipio_ and _suscipio_ #ic     5
  underf#, _-cepi_, _-ceptum_.

  VII. So seofoe PRAETERITVM getwfylt t forme
  stfgefg us: _pello_ #ic t drfe#, _pepuli_ #ic t drfde#,
  _pulsum_; _fallo_ #ic loge#, _fefelli_, _falsum_; _tollo_ #ic nime#,

  and _sublatum_; _cado_ #ic fealle#, _cecidi_, _casum_; _cano_ #ic    5
  singe#, _cecini_, _cantum_; _pario_ #ic cenne#, _peperi_, _partum_;

        _didici_,
  _discitum_; _tango_ #ic hreppe#, _tetigi_, _tactum_; _pango_ #ic

           CONIVNCTIVO MODO TEMPORE
  PRAESENTI _cum legar_, _cum legaris_ VEL _legare_, _cum
  legatur_; ET PLVRALITER _cum legamur_, _cum legamini_, _cum
  legantur_. EODEM MODO TEMPORE PRAETERITO INPERFECTO _cum             5
  legerer_, _cum legereris_ VEL _legerere_, _cum legeretur_;
        ET PLVRALITER
  _cum legeremur_, _cum legeremini_, _cum legerentur_.
  EODEM MODO TEMPORE PRAETERITO PERFECTO _cum lectus sim_,
  _cum lectus sis_, _cum lectus sit_; ET PLVRALITER _cum lecti
  simus_, _cum lecti sitis_, _cum lecti sint_. ET VLTERIORI MODO      10
  _cum lectus fuerim_, _cum lectus fueris_, _cum lectus fuerit_;
  ET PLVRALITER _cum lecti fuerimus_, _cum lecti fueritis_, _cum
  lecti fuerint_.

           EODEM MODO TEMPORE PRAETERITO PLVSQVAMPERFECTO
  _cum lectus essem_, _cum lectus esses_, _cum lectus
  esset_; ET PLVRALITER _cum lecti essemus_, _cum lecti essetis_,     15
  _cum lecti essent_. ET VLTERIORI MODO _cum lectus fuissem_,
  [[185]]
  _cum lectus fuisses_, _cum lectus fuisset_; ET PLVRALITER _cum
  lecti fuissemus_, _cum lecti fuissetis_, _cum lecti fuissent_.

lectus esset] lectusset _O_ 15 electi _vor_ essemus _T_, lecti: (s

           EODEM
  MODO TEMPORE FVTVRO _cum lectus ero_, _cum lectus eris_, _cum
  lectus erit_; ET PLVRALITER _cum lecti erimus_, _cum lecti eritis_,
  _cum lecti erunt_. ET VLTERIORI MODO _cum lectus fuero_, _cum        5
  lectus fueris_, _cum lectus fuerit_; ET PLVRALITER _cum lecti
  fuerimus_, _cum lecti fueritis_, _cum lecti fuerint_. INFINITIVO
  MODO, NVMERIS ET PERSONIS TEMPORE PRAESENTI _legi_, PRAETERITO
  _lectum esse_ VEL _fuisse_, FVTVRO _lectum iri_. DVO PARTICIPIA
  TRAHVNTVR A VERBO PASSIVO, PRAETERITI TEMPORIS ET                   10
  FVTVRI: PRAETERITI, VT _lectus_, FVTVRI, VT _legendus_.

  NEVTRI GENERIS: _labo_, _labas_, _labat_); _liquor_ #ic formylte#,

  DE QVARTA CONIVGATIONE.                                             15

  QVARTA CONIVGATIO #so fore# CONIVGATIO hf langne
  _is_ on m rum hde: _audio_ #ic gehre#, _audis_ #
  [[187]]
  gehrst#; and langne _i_ on IMPERATIVVM: _audi_ #gehr#.
  so CONIVGATIO g us: _audio_ #ic gehre#, _audis_ #
  gehrst#, _audit_ #h gehr#; ET PLVRALITER _audimus_,
  _auditis_, _audiunt_. EODEM MODO TEMPORE PRAETERITO INPERFECTO
  _audiebam_, _audiebas_, _audiebat_; ET PLVRALITER _audiebamus_,      5
  _audiebatis_, _audiebant_.

  _audite_, _audiant_. EODEM MODO TEMPORE FVTVRO _audito tu_,         15
  _audito ille_; ET PLVRALITER _audiamus_, _auditote_, _audiunto_.

  II. So er PRAETERITVM geenda on _si_: _fulcio_ #ic
  underlecge# oe #underwreige#, _fulsi_, _fultum_; _sarcio_         5
  #ic siwige#, _sarsi_, _sartum_ (of m is _sartor_ #samystre#,

  _refercio_ #ic ongen fylle#, _-fersi_, _-fertum_; _raucio_
        #ic hsige#,
  _rausi_, _rausum_ (of m is _raucus_ and _rauca_ #hs#);           10

  _saepio_ #ic ymbhegige#, _saepsi_, _saeptum_.                       15

  [[191]]
  III. So ridde PRAETERITVM geenda on _ui_: _aperio_
  #ic geopenige#, _aperui_, _apertum_; _cooperio_ #ic oferwro#,
  _cooperui_, _coopertum_. _prosilio_ #ic for rse#, _prosilui_;
  _insilio_ #ic on behlape#, _insilui_; _dissilio_ #ic of lhte#,
  _dissilui_: s word synd gefgede of _salio_ #ic hlape#,           5
  ac h nabba nnne SOPINVM on gewunan.

1 _absatz nur DU_  _zahl f. FHhJOW_ (III in ui _am rande a. hd. F_)

  [[194]]
  DE VERBO PASSIVO.

  _Audior_ #ic eom gehred# is rwigendlc word, _audiris_
  # eart gehred#, _auditur_ #h is gehred#; ET PLVRALITER
  _audimur_, _audimini_, _audiuntur_. EODEM MODO TEMPORE
  PRAETERITO INPERFECTO _audiebar_, _audiebaris_ VEL _audiebare_,      5
  _audiebatur_; ET PLVRALITER _audiebamur_, _audiebamini_,
        _audiebantur_.
  EODEM MODO TEMPORE PRAETERITO PERFECTO _auditus
  sum_, _auditus es_, _auditus est_; ET PLVRALITER _auditi sumus_,
  _auditi estis_, _auditi sunt_. ET VLTERIORI MODO _auditus fui_,
  _auditus fuisti_, _auditus fuit_; ET PLVRALITER _auditi fuimus_,    10
  _auditi fuistis_, _auditi fuerunt_ VEL _fuere_. EODEM MODO TEMPORE
  PRAETERITO PLVSQVAMPERFECTO _auditus eram_, _auditus eras_, _auditus
  erat_; ET PLVRALITER _auditi eramus_, _auditi eratis_, _auditi
  erant_. ET VLTERIORI MODO _auditus fueram_, _auditus fueras_,       14
  _auditus fuerat_; ET PLVRALITER _auditi fueramus_, _auditi fueratis_,
  _auditi fuerant_.

  [[199]]
  DE VERBIS ANOMALIS VEL INEQVALIBVS.

  Sume word synd gehtene ANOMALA oe INEQVALIA. ANOMALVS
  is #unemne#, INEQVALIS #ungelc#: h synd sw gehtene,
  foran e h ne g n, swsw re word,
  on sumere stwe.                                                     5

1 _berschr. f. JW_  uerb:is _D_  annomalis _U_, onomalis _D_ 
uel] o _O_, et _P, f. DH_  inequalia _U, f. D_ 2 ume _W_, u _auf r.
O_  siond _H_, beo _W_  gehate _CU_  anomala _J und aus_ on- _R
u. aus_ onam- _v. a. hd. O_; onomala _aus_ an- _r_, onomala _CDFHhU_,

onomalis _HW_ 3 is unemne _gl. R_  unnemne _C_  ungelic _gl. R_, is
ungelic _T_  siond _H_, beo _W_ 4 nout _W_  _nur ein_ swa _CDPTU_
 a ore _Jr_ 5 sumre _HT_, ore _r_  stude_W_

  [[203]]
  DE VERBIS DEFECTIVIS.

  Sume word syndon gehtene DEFECTIVA, t synd
  #teorigendlce#, foran e h teorja on sumere
  stwe. _ferio_ #ic sla# nf nnne PRAETERITVM PERFECTVM,
  btan hit nime of rum worde s ylcan andgites:                    5
  _percutio_ #ic sla#, _percussi_ #ic slh#. _fero_ #ic bere# maca
  PRAETERITVM _tuli_ of m worde _tollo_ #ic nime# oe #bere#.
  _sisto_ #ic sette# nim PRAETERITVM of _statuo_ #ic sette#,
  _statui_. _furo_ #ic wde# (_furis_, _furit_) maca _insaniui_ of
  _insanio_ #ic wde#. _uescor_ #ic gereordige# (_uesceris_, _uescitur_)
  is DEPONENS and nim PRAETERITVM _pastus sum_ of                    11
  m worde _pascor_ #ic eom fd# oe #gelswod#. _medeor_
  #ic lcnige# nim PRAETERITVM of _medicor_, _medicatus
  sum_. _reminiscor_ #ic gemune# nim of _recordor_, _recordatus
  [[204]]
  sum_ #ic gemunde#. _cresco_ #ic wexe# nim of _cerno_ #ic
  geso# PRAETERITVM _creui_ #ic wex# oe #geseah#. _maereo_
  #ic gnornige# maca PRAETERITVM _maestus sum_: hit sceolde
  macjan _maerui_, ac se gewuna hit ne geafa (of isum
  is _maeror_ #gnornung#). _mereor_ #ic geearnige# maca               5
  _merui_ #ic geearnode# VEL _meritus sum_ (of m is _meritum_
  #geearnung#).

1 _berschrift_ (_raum dafr W_) _f. JW_, de u. defectibus _C_, de
fectibus uerbis _U_  u _in_ uerbis _auf r. O_  defec[tiuis] _S, 2._
e _auf r. 2 buchst._ (_deren letzter_ n) _F_ 2 _kein absatz J_  [Sume
w. si]ndon _S_  ume _W_  siondon _H_, beo _W_  [gehatene

  [[211]]
  DE SPECIE.

  SPECIES is #hiw#, PRIMITIVA #frumcenned# and DIRIVATIVA
  #ofgangende#. ealle  eahta PARTES fornen habba
  s tw hiw. _lego_ #ic rde# is frumcenned. onne cym
  of m _lecturio_ #m lyst rdan#. is hiw is gehten                5
  MEDITATIVA SPECIES, t is #smagendlc hiw#, and ealle
   word g fter re foran geodnysse, ah e
   word, e h of cuma, bon mislcra geodnyssa.
  _amo_ #ic lufige#, _amaturio_ #m lyste lufjan#; _dictaturio_
  #m lyste dihtan#; _docturio_ #m lyste tcan#; _esurio_ #m        10
  hingra#; _scripturio_ #m lyste wrtan#; _auditurio_ #m
  lyste gehran#; _dormiturio_ #m lyste slpan#; ET SIMILIA.

  DE INCHOATIVIS.

  er hiw is gehten INCHOATIVA, t is #onginnendlc#,
  [[212]]
  foran e hit getcna weorces anginn, and cym
  of rum wordum. _caleo_ #ic wearmige# and of m
  _calesco_ #ic onginne t wearmigenne#; _horreo_ #ic andracige#,
  _horresco_ #ic onginne t anracigenne#. ealle
  h bo cennede of m rum hde, gyf  dst nne                 5
  _co_ r t. _ardeo_ #ic byrne#, _ardes_ # byrnst#; _ardesco_.
  _palleo_ #ic blcige#, _pallesco_ #ic onginne t blcigenne#.
  _albeo_ #ic hwtige#, _albesco_. _dureo_ #ic heardige#, _duresco_.

  DE VERBIS FREQVENTATIVIS.                                            5

  Sume word synd gecwedene FREQVENTATIVA, t synd
  #gelmlcende#, foran e h getcnja gelmlcunge,
  onne man sum ingc gelme d. _rogo_ #ic bidde# and
  of m _rogito_ #ic bidde gelme#. _uolo_ #ic flo#, _uolas_;
  _uolito_ #ic flicerige#. s word synd ealle re forman            10
  geodnysse and macja gelme PASSIVA. INCHOATIVA synd
  re riddan geodnysse and NEVTRA, swsw MEDITATIVA.
  eft _quaero_ #ic sce#, _quaerito_; _quaeso_ #ic bidde#, _quaesito_;
  _domo_ #ic gewylde# oe #temige#, _domito_; _fugio_ #ic flo#,
  _fugito_; _nosco_ #ic oncnwe#, _noscito_. IN SO. sume geendja     15
  [[214]]
  on _so_: _mergo_ #ic besence#, _merso_ #ic doppete#;
  _curro_ #ic yrne#, _curso_ oe _cursito_ (of m is _cursor_
  #rynel#); ET SIMILIA. sume geendja on _xo_: _necto_ #ic
  cnytte#, _nexo_ #ic cnytte gelme#; _flecto_ #ic gebge#,
  _flexo_. sume geendja on _xor_: _amplector_ #ic ymbclyppe#,         5
  _amplexor_; _sequor_ #ic fylige#, _sector_; ET SIMILIA.

  Syndon ac on nre geendunge ger g word g
  naman. _cudo_ #ic smiige#, _cudis_ # smiast#: eft, gyf
   cwest _hic cudo_, _huius cudonis_, onne by hit nama
  #smi#. _palpo_ #ic grpige#, _palpas_; _hic palpo_ #es blinda     10
  mann#, _huius palponis_ #yses blindan#. _comedo_ #ic ete#,
  _hic comedo_ #es oferetola mann#. _uerbero_ #ic swinge#
  and #s e swing#. _caligo_ #m mistja mne agan#
  and _haec caligo_ #es mist#. _propago_ #ic tyddrige# and
  _haec propago_ #tyddrung# oe #bh#. _lanio_ #ic tslte#          15
  and _lanio_ #cwellere#. _formido_ #ic forhtige# (_formidas_)
  [[217]]
  and _haec formido_ #os fyrhtu# (_huius formidinis_). _susurro_
  #ic rnige# (_susurras_) and _hic susurro_ #es rnere#
  oe #wrht#. _labor_ #ic tslde#, _laberis_ and _hic labor_
  #is geswinc#. _furor_ #ic stele# (_furaris_) and _hic furor_
  #os htheortnys#. _amor_ #ic eom gelufod# and _hic                 5
  amor_ #os lufu#. _nitor_ #ic hycge# (_niteris_) and _hic nitor_
  #os beorhtnyss#. _liquor_ #ic formylte# (_liqueris_) and
  _hic liquor_ #es wta#; ET SIMILIA.

  Ealle  ADVERBIA, e geendja on _a_, habba langne
  _a_: _antea_ #r#, _postea_ #syan#, _interea_ #betwyx m#,
  _praeterea_ #tforan m#. _ita_ #sw#, is n hf sceortne
  _a_.  e on _e_ geendja, habba sume sceortne _e_, sume          10
  langne. ds habba sceortne _e_: _paene_ #forneh#, _saepe_
  #gelmlce#; _inde_ #anon# oe #syan# and of m
  _deinde_ #syan#, _exinde_ #syan# (man cwe ac _dein_
  and _exin_), _subinde_ #anon#, _proinde_ #for  onne#; _peregre_
  #lodiglce#, _peregre sum hic_ #ic eom lodiglce              15
  hr#, _peregre proficiscor_ #lodiglce ic fare#,
  _peregre aduenio_ #lodiglce ic t cume#, _peregre transeo_
  #lodiglce ic oferfare#; _facile_ #aelce#, _forte_
  #frunga#, _sponte_ #sylfwilles#, _mane_ #on rne merigen#,
  [[235]]
  _utpote_ #swylce ic sw cwee#, _bene_ #wel#, _male_ #yfele#
  ET CETERA.

  DE PARTICIPIO.

it]reowod _W_ 11 o. sc. t. _in d. z. R_  oe] _r_

  [[Of m ff rwigendlcum NEVTRVM cuma ro
    text has neutrum in plain type]]

  Of m worde, e is gecweden DEPONENS, cuma
  ro PARTICIPIA. _loquor_ #ic sprece# is DEPONENS, and of
  m is PARTICIPIVM _loquens_ #sprecende# and _locutus_ #s
  e sprc# and _loquuturus_ #s e wyle# oe #sceal                 15
  sprecan#.

12 _kein absatz_  [depon]ens _W_ 13 rio _H_ 14 parti[cipium] _W_ 
and] et _J_ 15 sprec _F_  and] et _J, f. FW_  locuturus _CDHUW_,
loquiturus _F_ 16 [speken]_W_

  Of m worde, e is gecweden COMMVNE, cuma
  fower PARTICIPIA, twegen ddlce and twegen rwigendlce.
  _osculor_ #ic cysse# getcna ger g dde g rwunge,
  and of m is PARTICIPIVM _osculans_ #cyssende#                     20
  [[248]]
  andwerdre tde, swsw ddlce word. er is forgewitenre
  tde rwigendlc: _osculatus_ #gecyssed#. ac
  w cwea _osculatus sum_ #ic cyste# oe #ic eom gecyssed#,
  _osculatus es_ t m rum hde, _osculatus est_
  t m riddan hde. twegen sind twerde, n ddlc                  5
  _osculaturus_ #s e wyle# oe #sceal cyssan# and er
  rwigendlc _osculandus_ #s e sceal bon gecyssed#.

  DE NVMERO.

  DE FIGVRA.

  Ne bi nn PARTICIPIVM gefged, bton t word, e
  h of cym, bo r gefged. _facio_ #ic wyrce# is nfeald
  word, and of m is nfeald PARTICIPIVM _faciens_ #wyrcende#.
  of m is gefged _perficio_ #ic gefremme#, and                     10
  of m is gefged PARTICIPIVM _perficiens_ #gefremmende#;
  and sw fela re. gif onne se PARTICIPIVM bi gefged
  urh hine sylfne and t word ne bi n gefged,
  onne wyr se PARTICIPIVM t naman.

  CONIVNCTIO EST PARS ORATIONIS INDECLINABILIS ADNECTENS
  ORDINANSQVE SENTENTIAM. CONIVNCTIO mg bon gecweden
  [[258]]
  #geodnys#. s is #n dl ldensprce undeclinigendlc
  gefstnjende and endebyrdigende
  lcne cwyde#. swsw lm gefstna fel t sumum
  brede, sw getg so CONIVNCTIO  word tgdere.
  es dl gefstna and gefrtwa ldensprce and hwlon               5
  tsct and hwlon geendebyrt. _pius et fortis fuit
  Dauid rex_ #rfst and strang ws DAVID cyning#:
  se _et_ is CONIVNCTIO, t is on englisc #and#. _ego et tu_
  #ic and #, _nos et uos_ #w and g# wylla n. n 
  miht gehran, h es dl tg  word tgdere. nf                10
  es dl nne mihte n nn andgit, gif h na stent,
  ac on endebyrdnysse ldensprce h gelma  word,
  n h ne bi nht on englisc wend btan rum wordum.

  ciuitatem_ #bton drihten gehealde  burh#.

  PRISCIANVS cw, t sume sind ADVERSATIVAE, t
  [[264]]
  sind #wierrdlce#. _quamuis_, _quamquam_, _licet_, _etsi_,
  _etiamsi_, _tamen_. _quamuis clames, non audiat surdus_ #ah
  e  clypige, hit ne gehr se dafa#. _quamquam
  stultus moneatur, non emendetur_ #ah e se stunta
  bo gemynegod, h ne by gerihtlht#. _licet petieris                5
  dimidium regni mei_ #ah e  bidde healfne
  dl mnes rces#. _licet_ #is lfed# is word: _mihi licet_
  #ic mt#, _nobis licet_ #w mton#; _tibi licuit_ # mstest#;
  _licitus sermo_ #lfed sprc#, _licita res_ #lfed ingc#,
  _licitum uerbum_ #lfed word#; _inlicitum_ #unlfed#; and         10
  PARTICIPIVM _licens_ #lfende# and ADVERBIVM _licenter_ #lfedlce#,
  swsw of _libet_ #m lyst# _libens_ #lustbre# and
  _libenter_ #lustlce#. se er _licet_ nf nht yses. _quamuis
  non roget, tamen uult habere_ #ah e h ne bidde,
  ah h wyle habban#. _tamen uult_ #ah h wyle#.                  15
  be m rum w sdon. _saltim_ getcna wanunge:
  _saltim, si haberem unum denarium_ #hru, gif ic hfde
  nne pening#; _si non uis legere, saltim audi_ #gif 
  nelt rdan, hlyst hru#.

  DE FIGVRA.

  Fawa CONIVNCTIONES bo gefgede. _si_ and _que_ and               10
  _ne_ underf fginge us: _si quis_ #sw hw#, _si quando_
  #gif fre# oe #hwnne#; _ne quis_: _ne quis furetur_ #t
  nn ne stele#, _ne quando obdormiam in morte_ #t ic
  nfre on dae ne slpe#; and s sind MOBILIA.
  _quisque_ #gehw#, _ubique_ #gehwr#, _undique_ #ghwanon#.         15
  on isum ftemystan nis n se _que_ ENCLETICA, foran e
  h ne hylt one swg him t, swsw his gewuna is.
  _nam_ is nfeald CONIVNCTIO, and _namque_ is gefged and
  sw gehwylce.

  [[267]]
  DE ORDINE.

  ORDO is #endebyrdnys#, and sume CONIVNCTIONES fter
  gecynde standa fre on foreweardan on lcere ldensprce,
  swsw d s: _at_, _ast_, _si_ and gehwylce re.
  s and illce synd gehtene PRAEPOSITIVAE, t sind                5
  #foresettendlce#. sume sind gehtene SVBIVNCTIVAE,
  t sind #underodendlce#, foran e h bo fre
  underodde on re ldensprce endebyrdnysse, swsw
  is _que_ and _autem_ and gehwylce re. sume sind
  COMMVNES, t is #gemnre endebyrdnysse#, foran e                 10
  h magon hwlon tforan standan, hwlon bftan, swsw
  d _ergo_ and _igitur_ and gehwylce re.

1 _berschrift f. J_  de _f. F_ 2 _kein absatz FW_  is e. _in d. z.
R_  sum[m]e _W_  coniunctionis _T_ 3 standa--ldenspr. _f. T_ 
forewerdan _R_, werdan _FW_  on _vor_ lcere _f. COTU_  lcre _R_,
[l]chere _W_ 3.4 on ledenspeche _W_, sprce (_ohne_ leden) _CU_ 4
swaswa--8 undereodde, _soweit nicht gl., auf r. R_  a. g. .] et
similia _T_  [o]re _W_ 5 s--9 re _f. T_  beo _W_  prepositie
_W_ 5.6 . s. f. _gl. R_ 5 beo _W_ 6 fore[set]tendliche _W_, -setend-
_J_  sind _v. ds. hd. am rande nachgetr. O_, be _W_ 7 . s. u. _gl.

-berd- _D_, -byrnisse _U_ 9 ihwl[k]e _W_  beo _W_ 10 t _usw. in d.

  INCIPIT PRAEPOSITIO.


  PRAEPOSITIO EST PARS ORATIONIS INDECLINABILIS. PRAEPOSITIO
  mg bon gecweden on englisc #foresetnys#, foran e                15
  h stent fre on foreweardan, sw hwr sw h by,
  bo h gefged t rum worde, ne bo h. hwlon h
  [[268]]
  geacna and gefyl ra worda andgit, e h t cym,
  and hwlon h went heora getcnunge and hwlon wana.
  _celsus_ is #halc#. d r t PRAEPOSITIO _ex_, onne by
  hit _excelsus_ #swe halc#: hr h gefyl t andgit.
  _iustus_ is #rihtws#. d r t PRAEPOSITIO _in_, onne by         5
  hit _iniustus_ #unrihtws#: hr h went t andgit. _rideo_
  #ic hliche#. d r t PRAEPOSITIO _sub_, onne by hit
  _subrideo_ #ic smercige#: hr h gewana t andgit and
  sw gehwr.

13 i. p. est _F_, de prepositione (_ohne_ incipit) _U, f. JW_ 14 _kein
absatz J_  repositio _W_  est] s _J_  indeclinabis _U_ 15
mg--englisc] is _T_  m[i beon icwe]en _W_  gec(w)yden _D_  -on
_h_ 16 o[n forewear]dan _W_  a _in dem zweiten_ swa _aus_ e _und_ a
_noch einmal drber J_ 17 (fe)ged _O_  t . w. _f. DT_  wordum _U_,
worden _W_  [ne beo he] _W_  _2._ h] he gefeged and _T_ 1 geeacno
_h, zweites_ e _sp. hd. auf r. F_  ara _CDT_  _ber_ a _in_ worda
_ein gz. kleines_ o _O_  [he to c.] _W_ 2 and] hwilon (_also_ hw.
_doppelt_) _T_  awend _U_ 3 [c. is hea]lic _W_  is h. _gl. R_ 4
swu[e h. her] _W_  h _f. Dh_ 5 is r. _gl. R_  pre[positio in
on]ne _W_ 6 hit--9 gehwr] t andgit gewanod _T_ (_vgl._ 8)  hr
_f. CU_  and[it rideo ic] _W_  andgit] gyt _J_ 7 hli(c)he _C_,
hlihhe _U_, hlihe _O_, hleihe _W_  praepositiuo _F_  (hit) _C_ 8
subrid[eo ic sm.] _W_  subridio _O_, subrid(v)o _F_  smer(c)ige _C,
erstes_ e _aus_ i? _O_, mearcige _F_  (he) _O_   _erstes_ a _in_
gewana _aus_ u_O_

  n ing gelimp isum dle, t is CASVS. twegen                    10
  CASVS h th him t, ACCVSATIVVM and ABLATIVVM. w
  wylla n rest wrtan  PRAEPOSITIONES, e belimpa

  _ante_, _aduersum_, _cis_, _citra_, _circum_, _circa_, _contra_,

        _prope_, _propter_,

        _circiter_, _usque_,
  _secus_, _penes_. w cwea _ad patrem_ #t fder#, _ad deum_

  #t gode#, _ad regem equito_ #t cyninge ic rde#. _apud
  homines sum_ #mid mannum ic eom#, _apud episcopum
  manet_ #mid m biscope h wuna#.

  aspicio, tu infra_ #ic hwige bufan and  beneoan#:

  #ic stande on s healfe and  ongen#: hr is se
  _contra_ ADVERBIVM; and sw gehwylce re.

           _tenus_ is ADVERBIVM mid
  Grcum, ac h is mid Ldenwarum geteald t PRAEPOSITIO,
  foran e h ne mg n standende nige mihte                        15
  habban, and by oftost sw ah geendebyrd bftan:

  t swurd#. ealsw _pubetenus_ # cnihthde# and

  one swuran#, _uerbotenus_ #be worde#, _talotenus_ # 
  andclow#. h bi ac geod GENITIVO fter grciscum
  gewunan: _crurumtenus_ #  sceancan# (_hoc crus_ #es             5

  went ac t ADVERBIVM: _actenus_ # t# and # is#.
  sume of isum bo ADVERBIA, swsw w r sdon.

  Gyt synd fower PRAEPOSITIONES, e magon bon geodde
  ger g ACCVSSATIVO g ABLATIVO: _in_, _sub_, _super_,             10
  _subter_. _in_ and _sub_ bo geodde ACCVSSATIVO, onne h
  getcnja AD LOCVM, t is #freld t sumere stwe#.
  _in urbem uado_ #ic gange in t re byrig#. _introibo
  in domum tuam, domine_ #ic gange in t num hse,
  drihten#. _in ciuitatem equitauit rex_ #in t re ceastre          15
  rd se cyning#. _sub ipsos postes_ #under m sylfum
  postum#. _gallina congregat pullos suos sub alas_ #henn
  gegadera hire cicenu under fierum#.

9 _kein absatz_  beo _W_  feorwer _T_  (pre)posisitiones _O_

           eft, onne
  [[274]]
  h getcnja IN LOCO, t is #on re stwe#, onne
  bo h geodde ABLATIVO. _in aula sedeo_ #on healle
  ic sitte#. _in lectulo iacet_ #on bedde h l#. _sub arbore
  sto_ #under trowe ic stande#. _sub diem_ and _sub die_
  #under dge#. _sub iustitiam_ and _sub iustitia_ #under              5
  rihtwsnysse#. _super_ and _subter_, onne h getcnja
  styrunge, onne bo h geodde ACCVSATIVO.

  gereorde bon wende. _la_ getcna yrsunge. _e_ gebcna

  lrow#, and h is ac n stf. _a_ and _e_ sindon INTERIECTIONES    5
  and PRAEPOSITIONES and ac stafas. _pro_ is PRAEPOSITIO
  and INTERIECTIO: _pro, si remeasset in urbem_ #al,
  gif h gecyrde in t re byrig#. hwlon h bo
  ac of rum partum gefgede. _pro dolor_ #wl# and
  gehwylce re, e gebcnja s mdes styrunge urh                 10
  clypunge. ealle h sind INTERIECTIONES, ac heora swg

  yllce re sindon englisce INTERIECTIONES.

  FINIVNT PARTES ANGLICE.                                             15

  DE NOMINIBVS NVMERORVM.


  Ic wylle ac wrtan on englisc  naman, e getcnja
  getel and  e him of cuma. _unus_ (I) #n# gebyra
  [[281]]
  t werlcum hde, _una_ t wflcum, _unum_ t NEVTRVM.
  _duo_ (II) #twegen# gebyrja t MASCVLINVM and t NEVTRVM,
  _duae_ #tw# t FEMININVM. _tres_ (III) #r# gebyrja t MASCVLINVM
  and FEMININVM, _tria_ #ro# t NEVTRVM. _quattuor_
  (IIII) #fower# gebyrja t eallum m rm cynnum                   5
  and sw for  hundtontig. _quinque_ (V) _uiri_ #ff ceorlas#.

15 f. p. a.] partes orationis finiunt _v. neuerer hd. T, in dem nun nur
noch_ 4^3--6^3 six _folgt_  partis _h_  ang:lice _O_  _zwischen 15
u. 16 unter der berschrift_ INCIPIVNT QVINQVE DECLINATIONES _lat.
fragen ber dieselben auf nicht ganz zwei seiten und dann eine seite
leer D_ 16 _f. JW_ 17 ic] c _W_  awriten _J_ 18 getl _F_  a

  TRIGINTA DIVISIONES GRAMMATICAE ARTIS.


  GRAMMA on grcisc is LITTERA on lden and on englisc
  #stf#, and GRAMMATICA is #stfcrft#. se crft geopena            10
  and gehylt ldensprce, and nn man nf ldenbca
  andgit befullon, bton h one crft cunne. se crft
  is ealra bclcra crfta ordfruma and grundweall. GRAMMATICVS
  is, s e can one crft grammatican befullan.
  and se crft hf rtig tdl.                                     15

7. 8 _berschrift f._ (_aber eine zeile leer_) _J_ 7 gramatice _C_ 8
aris _F_ 9 lyttera: _C_  lden _H_  nglis _H_ 10 and :: _C_ 
gammatica _O_, gramatica _J_ 11 _1._ and _nachtrglich C_  halt _W_ 
lden- _H_ 11.12 leden[b. and]it _W_ 11 ledenboc _H_ 12 -fullan _CHU_
 _2._ crf(t) _a. hd.? h_ 13 [crefta ord]frum _W_  grundwl _J_,
-weall: _D_ 13.14 g(r)ammaticus _O_ 14 grammatica[n beful]lan _W_ 
grammaticam _RU_  befullon _J_ 15 rittig _CDFHJU_, ritti _W_  a
_in_ todal _auf r.O_

  [[#stf#, and GRAMMATICA is #stfcrft#.
    text has stfcrft in plain type]]

  (I) t forme tdl is VOX #stemn#, (II) t er
  [[290]]
  LITTERA #stf#, (III) t ridde is SILLABA #stfgefg#.
  be isum rm tdlum w writon on forewerdre yssere
  bc. fter isum w tella OCTO PARTES ORATIONIS, t
  synd # eahta dlas ldensprce#, be m e os
  bc is geset, ac w secga hr, t fower ra dla                 5
  synd DECLINABILIA, t is #declinigendlce#.  r
  man gebg on casum: NOMEN and PRONOMEN and PARTICIPIVM.
  VERBVM bi gebged IN MODIS, t is #on gemetum#
  oe #on re sprce wson#.  re fower:
  ADVERBIVM, CONIVNCTIO, PRAEPOSITIO, INTERIECTIO, sindon             10
  INDECLINABILIA, t is #undeclinigendlce#. hr synd
  n geteald endlufan tdl.

  foran e se cyning sceal mid micelum wsdme
  his lode wissjan and bewerjan mid crfte. _homo_ #mann#
  is gecweden fram HVMO, t is fram #moldan#, foran                 10
  e so eore ws s mannes antimber; and sw gehwylce
  re.

  unbegunnen and fre bi ungeendod#. _caelum_ heofen.                 5

  grsecg. _homo_ mann. _mas_  _masculus_ werhdes mann.             10
  _femina_ wfhdes mann. _sexus_ werhd #oe# wfhd.

       *       *       *       *       *
